name: smart-parking-iot
description: Smart Parking Reservation IoT System with simulated locks and gateways

scripts.start-system: concurrently "npm run broker" "npm start" "npm run start-gateway gateway_001" "npm run start-gateway gateway_002"
scripts.start-system-windows: concurrently "npm run broker" "npm run start-windows" "npm run start-gateway gateway_001" "npm run start-gateway gateway_002"

author: IoT Project Team
